name: Aptos Beacon Program
description: CYC Aptos Beacon program creates opportunities for student exploration, innovation, and creativity, and moments to travel beyond their imaginations. Students can choose a variety of classes that match their interests and challenge their skills—e.g. DIY projects, Pokemon trading, coding, ping pong, cooking, skateboarding, art, reading, college and career awareness, STEAM, and fitness. In our Career Awareness Pathway and STEAM programs, youth have a chance to plan for their futures, goal-set, skil
